::Shadow Wing::

She looked into his eyes and smiled.  She thought she knew what he 
was going to say, but wanted to hear it from him. 
"You will once again see me, and have me stand by you. I won't leave 
you ever agian.  I couldn't bare to do that. Not after coming so 
close to loosing you."  She smiled at him and felt her spark beating, 
it was beating for him. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine saw a smile on the face of the beautiful female bot next 
to 
> him. He didn't deserve the smile, in most ways he didn't deserve 
> her. "Thank you Wing I promised to protect your spark and you were 
> nearly offlined. I should've been better, I couldn't keep my word 
to 
> you and now thanks to my arrogance I may never get another chance 
to 
> hold you in my arms. I just think you should know that I lo....."
> 
> He could feal a change in himself, he didn't know what the change 
was 
> but it fealt strange, not frightening.
> 
> What was he fealing? toon in tomorrow same Bat time same Bat channel
>
